answers.answer: Your doctor should cover these concerns for you.
Yeah... i agree. These are questions for the doctor.
Yes, you are.  High blood pressure is only one symptom of preeclampsia. Be prepared for bed rest, possibly medicine, no stress tests and early delivery.
I had this with my 1st pregnancy starting around the same time,  but I had high blood pressure. They induced the day i hit 37 weeks.

question: So Im 28 wks 2 days and I took a 24 hr urine test and my numbers came back high 171 when they should be between 50-80...I have also had persistent bad headaches some dizziness shortness of breath and fatigue. but no high blood pressure so am I preeclamptic or not? Would it be mild or severe? What is the treatment for this while pregnant? Ik the only cure is delivery.any ladies with experience please reply.thanks!
title: preeclamsia/protein in urine
